content: @Bryn Rhodes hi this UML is really hard to read, and I think it hasn't been laid out again after some recent big changes. I have changed the StructureDefinition coordinates to make it readable (not checked in yet). However that seems to be ignored because there is a file plandefinition.svg checked in (as well as plandefinition.gen.svg, not checked in). Should I delete plandefinition.svg and rely on the StructureDefinition in future or are we using the SVG as the master somehow?
svg is the master. edit it using inkscape
do we have to add whole classes and attributes to the SVG now manually?
no the svg is regenerated each time
Having deleted the .svg one it gets regenerated as the .gen.svg one (taking the coords I manually added). So if I put that back over the other it will be ok from now on.
